name: Alphabear: Hardcover Edition
description: Alphabear is an award-winning, original English word puzzle game by Spry Fox. Spell words, collect bears!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1+ Processor: Intel Core Duo 1.66GHz or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 128+ MB Storage: 400 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core Duo 1.66GHz or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 256+ MB Storage: 400 MB available space
